hadiths.text: Abu Sa'id al-Kbudri (Allah be pleased with him) reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said:O Allah, bless us in our sa' and mud and shower with its blessings two other blessings (multiply blessings showerted upon it)

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّرْغِيبِ فِي سُكْنَى الْمَدِينَةِ وَالصَّبْرِ عَلَى لأْوَائِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement to live in Al-Madinah and to be patient on bearing its distress and hardships
